00158     public static class ButtonListener8 implements FieldChangeListener {
00159         Citation c;
00160         CitationScreen8 cs8;
00161                     
00162         public ButtonListener8(CitationScreen8 _cs8, Citation _n8){
00163             cs8 = _cs8;
00164             c = _n8;
00165         }
00166                     
00167         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00168             ButtonField btn4 = (ButtonField) field;
00169             if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Next"){ 
00170                 cs8.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00171                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen9(c));
00172             }
00173             else if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Prev"){
00174                 cs8.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00175                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(cs8);
00176             }   
00177         }
00178     } 
00179     
00180 
00181     private MenuItem saveItem8 = new MenuItem("Save", 110, 10) {
00182         public void run() {       
00183                 storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00184                 CitationStore.Save();          
00185         }
00186     };
00187 
00188     private MenuItem getItem8 = new MenuItem("Get", 110, 11) {
00189         public void run() {  
00190                 CitationStore.Restore();
00191                 restoreUIFieldsFromCitation();   
00192         }
00193     };     
00194 
00199     private void storeUIFieldsToCitation()
00200     {
00201         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.STATUTE, field_statute.getText());
00202         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.FINE, field_fine.getText());
00203         
00204         String intentionalStatus = field_intentional.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00205         String knowingStatus = field_knowing.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00206         String recklessStatus = field_reckless.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00207         String criminal_negStatus = field_criminal_neg.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00208         String culpableStatus = field_culpable.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00209         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.INTENTIONAL, intentionalStatus);  
00210         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.KNOWING, knowingStatus);  
00211         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.RECKLESS, recklessStatus);  
00212         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.CRIMINAL_NEG, criminal_negStatus); 
00213         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.CULPABLE, culpableStatus);        
00214     }
00215  
00216     
00222     private void restoreUIFieldsFromCitation()
00223     {
00224         field_statute.setText(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.STATUTE));
00225         field_fine.setText(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.FINE));
00226         
00227         boolean intentionalStatus = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.INTENTIONAL).equals("true");
00228         boolean knowingStatus = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.KNOWING).equals("true");
00229         boolean recklessStatus = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.RECKLESS).equals("true");
00230         boolean criminal_negStatus = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.CRIMINAL_NEG).equals("true");
00231         boolean culpableStatus = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.CULPABLE).equals("true");
00232         field_intentional.setChecked(intentionalStatus);
00233         field_knowing.setChecked(knowingStatus); 
00234         field_reckless.setChecked(recklessStatus);
00235         field_criminal_neg.setChecked(criminal_negStatus); 
00236         field_culpable.setChecked(culpableStatus);
00237     } 
00238     
00239 }
